meanings.definition: A loud shout or cheer of enthusiasm or approval.
meanings.sent1: The crowd erupted in hoorahs when the team scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: The hoorahs from the audience filled the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The hoorahs of the fans could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent4: Her hoorahs echoed through the valley, signaling her victory.
meanings.sent5: The hoorahs of the supporters were deafening, showing their unwavering support.

meanings.sent1: She had a hoorahs expression on her face when she won the prize.
meanings.sent2: The children's faces lit up with hoorahs smiles at the sight of the presents.
meanings.sent3: His hoorahs dance moves entertained everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The hoorahs colors of the fireworks painted the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The hoorahs atmosphere at the carnival was infectious, spreading joy to all attendees.
